div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1534 Bab (anc. Batnae) environs, between Beroea and Hierapolis, Cyrrhestica, 1944 Burial: 250-200 B.C. (Thompson-Bellinger) Contents: 1080 AR dr. Alexander 111 lifetime and post.: Lamp- sacus 31 (12), Abydus 33 (15), Colo- phon 32 (11), Teos 8 (2), Miletus 10 (14), Magnesia 16 (6), Sardes 3 (3), Tenedos? 1 (1), Chios 1 (14), Aradus 1, Euboea ? 6 (5), Pamphylia ? 5 (1), Ephesus 1 (1), unc. mints 4 (9) Philip III: Lampsacus 8 (4), Abydus (1), Teos 1, Colophon 16 (3), Magnesia 5 (3), Miletus 1, Sardes 3 (2), Pam- phylia ? 1 Demetrius Poliorcetes: Miletus 6 (2) Lysimachus: Lampsacus 5 (5), Abydus 3, Teos 1, Colophon 6 (5), Magnesia 1 (3), Mytilene (1), Ephesus (9), Lysimacheia 1, Thrace ? (1), unc. mint (1) Seleucus I: Unc. mint of the Aradian Paralia ?
